verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> But Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said
שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Hear שָׁ֭מוֹעַ <WH8085> diligently מִלָּתִ֑י <WH4405> my speech וּתְהִי־ <WH1961> become זֹ֝֗את <WH2063> likewise תַּנְח֥וּמֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH8575> and let this be your consolations
שָׂ֭אוּנִי <WH5375> Suffer וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> me that I may speak וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> and after דַּבְּרִ֣י <WH1696> that I have spoken תַלְעִֽיג׃ <WH3932> mock on
הֶ֭אָנֹכִי <WH595> I לְאָדָ֣ם <WH120> man שִׂיחִ֑י <WH7879> As for me [is] my complaint וְאִם־ <WH518> lo מַ֝דּ֗וּעַ <WH4069> how לֹא־ <WH3808> not תִקְצַ֥ר <WH7114> be troubled רוּחִֽי׃ <WH7307> air
פְּנוּ־ <WH6437> Mark אֵלַ֥י <WH413> at וְהָשַׁ֑מּוּ <WH8074> me and be astonished וְשִׂ֖ימוּ <WH7760> and lay יָ֣ד <WH3027> [your] hand עַל־ <WH5921> over פֶּֽה׃ <WH6310> upon [your] mouth
וְאִם־ <WH518> when זָכַ֥רְתִּי <WH2142> Even when I remember וְנִבְהָ֑לְתִּי <WH926> I am afraid וְאָחַ֥ז <WH270> taketh hold on בְּ֝שָׂרִ֗י <WH1320> my flesh פַּלָּצֽוּת׃ <WH6427> and trembling
מַדּ֣וּעַ <WH4069> Why רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> Wherefore do the wicked יִחְי֑וּ <WH2421> live עָ֝תְק֗וּ <WH6275> become old גַּם־ <WH1571> also גָּ֥בְרוּ <WH1396> yea are mighty חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> very

זַרְעָ֤ם <WH2233> Their seed נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> is established לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH6440> in their sight עִמָּ֑ם <WH5973> with וְ֝צֶאֱצָאֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6631> with them and their offspring לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> before their eyes
בָּתֵּיהֶ֣ם <WH1004> Their houses שָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> [are] safe מִפָּ֑חַד <WH6343> from fear וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> neither [is] the rod אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> of God עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and

שׁוֹר֣וֹ <WH7794> Their bull עִ֭בַּר <WH5674> gendereth וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> without יַגְעִ֑ל <WH1602> and faileth תְּפַלֵּ֥ט <WH6403> calveth פָּ֝רָת֗וֹ <WH6510> not their cow וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> without תְשַׁכֵּֽל׃ <WH7921> and casteth not her calf
יְשַׁלְּח֣וּ <WH7971> They send forth כַ֭צֹּאן <WH6629> like a flock עֲוִילֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5759> their little ones וְ֝יַלְדֵיהֶ֗ם <WH3206> and their children יְרַקֵּדֽוּן׃ <WH7540> dance
יִ֭שְׂאוּ <WH5375> They take כְּתֹ֣ף <WH8596> the timbrel וְכִנּ֑וֹר <WH3658> and harp וְ֝יִשְׂמְח֗וּ <WH8055> and rejoice לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> at the sound עוּגָֽב׃ <WH5748> of the organ
[יְבַלּוּ כ] (יְכַלּ֣וּ <WH1086> consume ק) בַטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> in wealth יְמֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3117> their days וּ֝בְרֶ֗גַע <WH7281> and in a moment שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> to the grave יֵחָֽתּוּ׃ <WH5181> go

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> Therefore they say לָ֭אֵל <WH410> unto God ס֣וּר <WH5493> Depart מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at וְדַ֥עַת <WH1847> not the knowledge דְּ֝רָכֶ֗יךָ <WH1870> of thy ways לֹ֣א <WH3808> even חָפָֽצְנוּ׃ <WH2654> from us for we desire

מַה־ <WH4100> Who שַׁדַּ֥י <WH7706> What [is] the Almighty כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if נַֽעַבְדֶ֑נּוּ <WH5647> that we should serve וּמַה־ <WH4100> and what נּ֝וֹעִ֗יל <WH3276> him? and what profit כִּ֣י <WH3588> if נִפְגַּע־ <WH6293> should we have if we pray בּֽוֹ׃

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold לֹ֣א <WH3808> not בְיָדָ֣ם <WH3027> [is] not in their hand טוּבָ֑ם <WH2898> Lo their good עֲצַ֥ת <WH6098> the counsel רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked רָ֣חֲקָה <WH7368> is far מֶֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

כַּמָּ֤ה ׀ <WH4100> How נֵר־ <WH5216> How oft is the candle רְשָׁ֘עִ֤ים <WH7563> of the wicked יִדְעָ֗ךְ <WH1846> put out וְיָבֹ֣א <WH935> and [how oft] cometh עָלֵ֣ימוֹ <WH5921> out אֵידָ֑ם <WH343> their destruction חֲ֝בָלִ֗ים <WH2256> sorrows יְחַלֵּ֥ק <WH2505> upon them [God] distributeth בְּאַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> in his anger

יִהְי֗וּ <WH1961> become כְּתֶ֥בֶן <WH8401> They are as stubble לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> the wind וּ֝כְמֹ֗ץ <WH4671> and as chaff גְּנָבַ֥תּוּ <WH1589> carrieth away סוּפָֽה׃ <WH5492> that the storm

אֱל֗וֹהַּ <WH433> God יִצְפֹּן־ <WH6845> layeth up לְבָנָ֥יו <WH1121> for his children אוֹנ֑וֹ <WH205> his iniquity יְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> he rewardeth אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> that וְיֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> him and he shall know

יִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> shall see [עֵינֹו כ] (עֵינָ֣יו <WH5869> affliction ק) כִּיד֑וֹ <WH3589> his destruction וּמֵחֲמַ֖ת <WH2534> of the wrath שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> of the Almighty יִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> and he shall drink

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For מַה־ <WH4100> what חֶפְצ֣וֹ <WH2656> For what pleasure בְּבֵית֣וֹ <WH1004> [hath] he in his house אַחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> after וּמִסְפַּ֖ר <WH4557> him when the number חֳדָשָׁ֣יו <WH2320> of his months חֻצָּֽצוּ׃ <WH2686> is cut off in the midst
הַלְאֵ֥ל <WH410> God יְלַמֶּד־ <WH3925> Shall [any] teach דָּ֑עַת <WH1847> knowledge וְ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> that רָמִ֥ים <WH7311> those that are high יִשְׁפּֽוֹט׃ <WH8199> judges

זֶ֗ה <WH2088> One יָ֭מוּת <WH4191> One dieth בְּעֶ֣צֶם <WH6106> strength תֻּמּ֑וֹ <WH8537> in his full כֻּ֝לּ֗וֹ <WH3605> wholly שַׁלְאֲנַ֥ן <WH7946> being wholly at ease וְשָׁלֵֽיו׃ <WH7961> and quiet
עֲ֭טִינָיו <WH5845> His breasts מָלְא֣וּ <WH4390> are full חָלָ֑ב <WH2461> of milk וּמֹ֖חַ <WH4221> with marrow עַצְמוֹתָ֣יו <WH6106> and his bones יְשֻׁקֶּֽה׃ <WH8248> are moistened

וְזֶ֗ה <WH2088> another יָ֭מוּת <WH4191> And another dieth בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> of his soul מָרָ֑ה <WH4751> in the bitterness וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Never אָ֝כַ֗ל <WH398> and never eateth בַּטּוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> with pleasure
יַ֭חַד <WH3162> alike עַל־ <WH5921> in עָפָ֣ר <WH6083> in the dust יִשְׁכָּ֑בוּ <WH7901> They shall lie down וְ֝רִמָּ֗ה <WH7415> and the worms תְּכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> shall cover עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold יָ֭דַעְתִּי <WH3045> Behold I know מַחְשְׁבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4284> your thoughts וּ֝מְזִמּ֗וֹת <WH4209> and the devices עָלַ֥י <WH5921> and תַּחְמֹֽסוּ׃ <WH2554> [which] ye wrongfully imagine

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for תֹֽאמְר֗וּ <WH559> For ye say אַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> Where בֵית־ <WH1004> Where [is] the house נָדִ֑יב <WH5081> of the nobleman וְ֝אַיֵּ֗ה <WH346> and where אֹ֤הֶל ׀ <WH168> places מִשְׁכְּנ֬וֹת <WH4908> the dwelling רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <WH7563> wicked
הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> not שְׁ֭אֶלְתֶּם <WH7592> Have ye not asked ע֣וֹבְרֵי <WH5674> them that go דָ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> along וְ֝אֹתֹתָ֗ם <WH226> their tokens לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תְנַכֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH5234> recognize

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> to the day אֵ֭יד <WH343> of calamity יֵחָ֣שֶׂךְ <WH2820> is reserved רָ֑ע <WH7451> That the wicked לְי֖וֹם <WH3117> to the day עֲבָר֣וֹת <WH5678> of wrath יוּבָֽלוּ׃ <WH2986> will be led

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> Who shall declare עַל־ <WH5921> and פָּנָ֣יו <WH6440> accept דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> his way וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> hath עָ֝שָׂ֗ה <WH6213> him [what] he hath done מִ֣י <WH4310> and who יְשַׁלֶּם־ <WH7999> will repay לֽוֹ׃
וְ֭הוּא <WH1931> he לִקְבָר֣וֹת <WH6913> to the grave יוּבָ֑ל <WH2986> Yet shall he be brought וְֽעַל־ <WH5921> over גָּדִ֥ישׁ <WH1430> in the tomb יִשְׁקֽוֹד׃ <WH8245> and shall remain

מָֽתְקוּ־ <WH4985> shall be sweet ל֗וֹ רִגְבֵ֫י <WH7263> The clods נָ֥חַל <WH5158> of the valley וְ֭אַחֲרָיו <WH310> after כָּל־ <WH3605> all אָדָ֣ם <WH120> unto him and every man יִמְשׁ֑וֹךְ <WH4900> shall draw וּ֝לְפָנָ֗יו <WH6440> before אֵ֣ין <WH369> else מִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> him as [there are] innumerable

וְ֭אֵיךְ <WH349> How תְּנַחֲמ֣וּנִי <WH5162> How then comfort הָ֑בֶל <WH1892> ye me in vain וּ֝תְשֽׁוּבֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH8666> seeing in your answers נִשְׁאַר־ <WH7604> there remaineth מָֽעַל׃ <WH4604> falsehood ס
